channel.title: a John Friel website
channel.description: Recent content on a John Friel website

item.title: StockScrapeR
item.description: knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE) library(tidyverse) library(rvest) library(plyr) #devtools::install_github("wch/webshot") library(webshot) Scan Stock Market With Rvest and Webshot problem I wanted a way to look at stocks charts that quickly fit the range of investment I was looking to make. Let’s Grab all Stocks on the NYSE The following script will run rvest on a loop, each loop opens a new webpage. so the first run through opens eoddata.com/stocklist/NYSE/a.htm then grabs all stock information for Stock Tickers beginning with the letter A.

item.title: How to Make an R Powered Custom Visual
item.description: Power BI Custom Visuals This is a walkthrough on creating custom visuals for Power BI, specifically, R powered custom Visuals. The end product will be similar to the custom visuals found here. By the end of this tutorial we will have the following Plotly Scatter 3D chartâ€“fully interactive in Power BI as a custom visual. ## Warning: package 'bindrcpp' was built under R version 3.3.3 {"x":{"layout":{"margin":{"b":40,"l":60,"t":25,"r":10},"scene":{"xaxis":{"title":"Weight"},"yaxis":{"title":"Gross horsepower"

Heisman code{white-space: pre;} pre:not([class]) { background-color: white; } if (window.hljs && document.readyState && document.readyState === "complete") { window.setTimeout(function() { hljs.initHighlighting(); }, 0); } h1 { font-size: 34px; } h1.title { font-size: 38px; } h2 { font-size: 30px; } h3 { font-size: 24px; } h4 { font-size: 18px; } h5 { font-size: 16px; } h6 { font-size: 12px; } .table th:not([align]) { text-align: left; } .

item.title: About
item.description: Highly analytical and process oriented data analyst with 5+ years of experience. Aiming to utilize my strong sales experience and analytical ability to achieve the goals of your company. Double major from Penn State University with a Master’s degree from Southern Methodist in Business Analytics. Excellent Power BI skills. Three years experience in R and SQL.
